title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Airbus A320 - Amsterdam to Toulouse hyperlapse
description:
In this video I will fly from Amsterdam to Toulouse. This video is a hyperlapse which means the video which normally was over 2 hours has been shorted to approximately 3 minutes. The hyperlapse will result in video to be removed completely so don't expect me explaining something.

The software I used to create the hyperlapse is Microsoft Hyperlapse Pro. More information about the tool can be found on the site below:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/product/computational-photography-applications/microsoft-hyperlapse-pro/
